archimate:Requirement.name: CP-3(1): Contingency Training | Simulated Events
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Incorporate simulated events into contingency training to facilitate effective response by personnel in crisis situations.

properties.value: The use of simulated events creates an environment for personnel to experience actual threat events, including cyber-attacks that disable websites, ransomware attacks that encrypt organizational data on servers, hurricanes that damage or destroy organizational facilities, or hardware or software failures.
